Text:
hey Marthafar will you be uploading the rest of the series , and if so, in this format>?
Sure would be grateful.

I've been away. I have got the rest of the series (on another three discs) and some have even better menus! (same menus, but with better highlighting on selection).

However, I have storage space problems and a failing external HDD, so it may take a little while before I get properly sorted out, but I will try to get episodes 9-12 up soon!
